groups.description:
Custom groups configuration for organizing imports.
Each array element represents a group, and multiple group names in the same array are treated as one.
Accepts both `string` and `string[]` as group elements.
groups.markdownDescription:
Custom groups configuration for organizing imports.
Each array element represents a group, and multiple group names in the same array are treated as one.
Accepts both `string` and `string[]` as group elements.

internalPattern.description: Glob patterns to identify internal imports.
internalPattern.markdownDescription: Glob patterns to identify internal imports.

SortPackageJsonUserConfig.description:
User-provided configuration for `package.json` sorting.

- `true`: Enable sorting with default options
- `false`: Disable sorting
- `{ sortScripts: true }`: Enable sorting with custom options
SortPackageJsonUserConfig.markdownDescription:
User-provided configuration for `package.json` sorting.

- `true`: Enable sorting with default options
- `false`: Disable sorting
- `{ sortScripts: true }`: Enable sorting with custom options

TailwindcssConfig.description:
Configuration for Tailwind CSS class sorting.

Option names omit the `tailwind` prefix used in the original plugin
(e.g., `config` instead of `tailwindConfig`).

See [`prettier-plugin-tailwindcss` options](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss#options) for details.
TailwindcssConfig.markdownDescription:
Configuration for Tailwind CSS class sorting.

Option names omit the `tailwind` prefix used in the original plugin
(e.g., `config` instead of `tailwindConfig`).

See [`prettier-plugin-tailwindcss` options](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss#options) for details.

attributes.description:
List of attributes that contain Tailwind CSS classes.

Note: Regex patterns are not yet supported.

Example: `["myClassProp", ":class"]`

Default: `["class", "className"]`
attributes.markdownDescription:
List of attributes that contain Tailwind CSS classes.

Note: Regex patterns are not yet supported.

Example: `["myClassProp", ":class"]`

Default: `["class", "className"]`

config.description:
Path to your Tailwind CSS configuration file (v3).

Note: Paths are resolved relative to the Oxfmt configuration file.

Default: `"./tailwind.config.js"`
config.markdownDescription:
Path to your Tailwind CSS configuration file (v3).

Note: Paths are resolved relative to the Oxfmt configuration file.

Default: `"./tailwind.config.js"`

functions.description:
List of custom function names that contain Tailwind CSS classes.

Note: Regex patterns are not yet supported.

Example: `["clsx", "cn", "cva", "tw"]`

Default: `[]`
functions.markdownDescription:
List of custom function names that contain Tailwind CSS classes.

Note: Regex patterns are not yet supported.

Example: `["clsx", "cn", "cva", "tw"]`

Default: `[]`

stylesheet.description:
Path to your Tailwind CSS stylesheet (v4).

Note: Paths are resolved relative to the Oxfmt configuration file.

Example: `"./src/app.css"`
stylesheet.markdownDescription:
Path to your Tailwind CSS stylesheet (v4).

Note: Paths are resolved relative to the Oxfmt configuration file.

Example: `"./src/app.css"`

description:
Configuration options for the Oxfmt.

Most options are the same as Prettier's options.
See also <https://prettier.io/docs/options>

In addition, some options are our own extensions.
markdownDescription:
Configuration options for the Oxfmt.

Most options are the same as Prettier's options.
See also <https://prettier.io/docs/options>

In addition, some options are our own extensions.

arrowParens.description: Include parentheses around a sole arrow function parameter. (Default: `"always"`)
arrowParens.markdownDescription: Include parentheses around a sole arrow function parameter. (Default: `"always"`)

bracketSameLine.description:
Put the `>` of a multi-line JSX element at the end of the last line
instead of being alone on the next line. (Default: `false`)
bracketSameLine.markdownDescription:
Put the `>` of a multi-line JSX element at the end of the last line
instead of being alone on the next line. (Default: `false`)

bracketSpacing.description: Print spaces between brackets in object literals. (Default: `true`)
bracketSpacing.markdownDescription: Print spaces between brackets in object literals. (Default: `true`)

embeddedLanguageFormatting.description:
Control whether to format embedded parts in the file.
e.g. JS-in-Vue, CSS-in-JS, etc. (Default: `"auto"`)
embeddedLanguageFormatting.markdownDescription:
Control whether to format embedded parts in the file.
e.g. JS-in-Vue, CSS-in-JS, etc. (Default: `"auto"`)

endOfLine.description: Which end of line characters to apply. (Default: `"lf"`)
endOfLine.markdownDescription: Which end of line characters to apply. (Default: `"lf"`)

experimentalTailwindcss.description:
Experimental: Sort Tailwind CSS classes in string literals.

When enabled, `Oxfmt` sorts Tailwind CSS classes using the same algorithm as
[`prettier-plugin-tailwindcss`](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss).

See [`TailwindcssConfig`] for available options.

(Default: disabled)
experimentalTailwindcss.markdownDescription:
Experimental: Sort Tailwind CSS classes in string literals.

When enabled, `Oxfmt` sorts Tailwind CSS classes using the same algorithm as
[`prettier-plugin-tailwindcss`](https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss).

See [`TailwindcssConfig`] for available options.

(Default: disabled)

ignorePatterns.description: Ignore files matching these glob patterns. Current working directory is used as the root.
ignorePatterns.markdownDescription: Ignore files matching these glob patterns. Current working directory is used as the root.

insertFinalNewline.description: Whether to insert a final newline at the end of the file. (Default: `true`)
insertFinalNewline.markdownDescription: Whether to insert a final newline at the end of the file. (Default: `true`)

jsxSingleQuote.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JSX. (Default: `false`)
jsxSingleQuote.markdownDescription: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JSX. (Default: `false`)

objectWrap.description: How to wrap object literals when they could fit on one line or span multiple lines. (Default: `"preserve"`)
objectWrap.markdownDescription: How to wrap object literals when they could fit on one line or span multiple lines. (Default: `"preserve"`)

printWidth.description: The line length that the printer will wrap on. (Default: `100`)
printWidth.markdownDescription: The line length that the printer will wrap on. (Default: `100`)

quoteProps.description: Change when properties in objects are quoted. (Default: `"as-needed"`)
quoteProps.markdownDescription: Change when properties in objects are quoted. (Default: `"as-needed"`)

semi.description: Print semicolons at the ends of statements. (Default: `true`)
semi.markdownDescription: Print semicolons at the ends of statements. (Default: `true`)

singleAttributePerLine.description: Put each attribute on a new line in JSX. (Default: `false`)
singleAttributePerLine.markdownDescription: Put each attribute on a new line in JSX. (Default: `false`)

singleQuote.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes. (Default: `false`)
singleQuote.markdownDescription: Use single quotes instead of double quotes. (Default: `false`)

tabWidth.description: Number of spaces per indentation level. (Default: `2`)
tabWidth.markdownDescription: Number of spaces per indentation level. (Default: `2`)

useTabs.description: Use tabs for indentation or spaces. (Default: `false`)
useTabs.markdownDescription: Use tabs for indentation or spaces. (Default: `false`)
